attributes.action: PRISM surveillance & similar programs to be revealed and disbanded.
attributes.additional_details:
1) To declare when, where and how UK agencies have used data collected from the US PRISM surveillance system.
2) To publicly declare any other systems which operate on a similar principle of mass surveillance or data harvesting.
3) To shut-down those systems.
4) To enact an act of parliament or similar such that no future mass surveillance systems of this nature are used by any branch of government.
